site_name: St Saviours Church, 210 Markhouse Road, Walthamstow, London, E17 8EP
description: Oak (T17) - Reduce crown height by circa 2m and spread by circa 2.5-3m each side and balance remainder in proportion to the tree's original shape. Prune off trunk basal epicormic growth and prune off ivy at base.  Holm Oak (T16)  - Reduce crown height by circa 2.5m and spread by circa 2m (south) and 3m (north) and balance remainder in proportion to the tree's original shape. Turkey oak (T6) - Crown reduction by circa 3m and balance remainder in proportion to tree's original shape. Poplar (T5) - Crown reduction by circa 2.5m and prune off trunk basal epicormic. Lime x 7 (T11-15 inclusive) - Re-pollard by circa 1.5m and  prune off trunk basal epicormic. Lime (T9) - Prune off trunk epicormic to circa 3m. Carefully detach dead ivy stems and crown thin by 15 percent. Lime (T10) - Sever ivy, prune off basal and trunk epicormic to main crown break circa 3.5m and crown thin by 20 percent.
